text: [Today, I fell asleep on the office sofa.]
[But when I woke up, there was a blanket over me.]

[Though I don't know who it is,
thank you always.]

[Today, before the recording of the program,
we received a treat from the staff.]

[It was a delicious cream puff,
a sweet and delightful surprise...]

[I hope I can properly
show my gratitude for their thoughtfulness.]

Tenka-chan! Chiyuki-san!
Thank you for using #KindnessAwarenessMonth!

[We should be thanking you, Amana-chan
thank you for creating such a wonderful tag.]

[Tenka, too, with this tag,
wants to express her gratitude.]

[#KindnessAwarenessMonth,
it would be nice if we could spread it together.]
